description:
Cagalli and her golden mobile suit Akatsuki have turned the tide of battle in Orb`s favor, but she now finds herself facing enemy reinforcements, in the form of the Minerva and Shinn`s Destiny Gundam. Even as the Archangel rushes to Cagalli`s aid, Kira and Lacus return from space with a pair of new Gundams.
Source: crunchyroll
